entry.title: Scaling Bitcoin conference micro-report
entry.summary: Bitcoin's direction is uncertain as developers and miners are perceived to have control over its decisions. Until this is resolved, effective decisions cannot be made. The process of settling these issues remains unclear, leaving Bitcoin in a state of limbo. This perception of control has caused concern among those observing the cryptocurrency, and has led to widespread speculation about the future of Bitcoin. Despite this uncertainty, developers continue to work on improving the technology behind Bitcoin, with hopes that a solution will eventually be found.
